title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin credits Bill Belichick for the Patriots win over the Bills after only attempting 3 passes the entire game and what this says about Belichick's reputation as the greatest NFL coach of all time. He takes a look at QB Mac Jones after New England wins their 7th game in a row and if we are giving him enough credit for what he's accomplished so far. He shares his Herd Hierarchy after week 13 of the season. Finally, Chargers DB Chris Harris joins the show to discuss their defense shutting down Joe Burrow and what to expect from the Chiefs offense as they battle it out for playoff positions. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
